parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapon Pool
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Mission Information

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Saves object's properties to [[Objects.sav]] file in campaign directory as entry name.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''saveStatus''' name

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> name: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] saveStatus "playerstate"</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[loadStatus]]
</value></part></template>
